text: James David Santini (August 13, 1937 - September 22, 2015) was an American politician. He served as a United States Representative from Nevada from 1975 through 1983. Santini died on September 22, 2015, in Rockville, Maryland from esophageal cancer, aged 78. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Lawyers from Nevada Category:American lobbyists Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:United States representatives from Nevada Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: James David Santini
